description.value: These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. While wearing them, you have Advantage|XPHB on Wisdom (Perception|XPHB) checks that rely on sight. In conditions of clear visibility, you can make out details of even extremely distant creatures and objects as small as 2 feet across.
